name: Bending the rules - n° 3
description:
How much the rules can be twisted before breaking them ?

With this work I wanted to question the interpretation of the rules that each one makes.
The limits of the rules are not necessarily clear and can be understood and adapted through the prism of everyone.

Here the grids have almost the same rules but can be twisted according to a random degree of freedom.
We can see that in the end they have their own interpretation but still form a coherent whole.
When can we say that they break the rules and no longer look like the imposed schema?

1200x1900 png
An original artwork by Noctambul.
